docs.snippet: The Virginia Beach metropolitan area is one of the largest in the country without a major professional sports team, and numerous attempts to lure one here have repeatedly left sports fans in the area disappointed....
docs.lead_paragraph: The Virginia Beach metropolitan area is one of the largest in the country without a major professional sports team, and numerous attempts to lure one here have repeatedly left sports fans in the area disappointed.

headline.main: Va. Beach Mulls Arena That Could Lure NBA, NHL
headline.print_headline: Va. Beach Mulls Arena That Could Lure NBA, NHL

docs.snippet: Despite all his success picking stocks, Randy Kurtz now mostly buys index and exchange-traded funds for his clients....
docs.lead_paragraph: Despite all his success picking stocks, Randy Kurtz now mostly buys index and exchange-traded funds for his clients.
docs.abstract: Ron Lieber Your Money column on Randy Kurtz, who nine years ago made an extraordinary bet on himself, the stock market and his ability to pick a few winners; notes he told his investors unless his investments outperformed Standard & Poor’s 500-stock index, they would pay him nothing; says despite all his success at picking stocks, Kurtz now mostly buys index and exchange-traded funds for his clients.

headline.main: The Re-education of a Brash Young Stock Picker
headline.print_headline: The Re-education of a Brash Young Stock Picker

docs.snippet: The golf world has lost five million players in the last decade, spurring a growing revolution to create alternative forms of the game....
docs.lead_paragraph: The golf world has lost five million players in the last decade, spurring a growing revolution to create alternative forms of the game.
docs.abstract: Golf industry is experimenting with new rules, equipment and radical changes to courses as it tries to court younger generation; sport has lost some five million players over past decade, shift insiders attribute to its hidebound ways and exclusive image; some courses have begun offering 15-inch-wide holes for novices.

headline.main: In a Hole, Golf Considers Digging a Wider One
headline.print_headline: In a Hole, Golf Considers Digging a Wider One
